name: Prescient Applied Intelligence
overview: Prescient Applied Intelligence Inc. provides retail supply chain and replenishment solutions. The company offers retailer solutions that include demand signal repository, business intelligence, vendor managed inventory, store level replenishment, scan based trading, data synchronization, collaborative solutions, and computer aided ordering; and supplier solutions, such as demand signal repository, business intelligence, vendor managed inventory, store level replenishment, scan based trading, data synchronization, collaborative solutions, and share data for decision making. It also provides project planning, management, business process reengineering, application configuration, technology implementation, training, testing, and rollout services; business optimization, including supply chain assessment, scan based trading readiness assessment, system configuration evaluation, and shrink assessment; business process outsourcing; technical services, which include technology consulting, software enhancements, database migration service, on-line to batch conversion, and database health check; delivery programs, such as knowledge exchange and on-site training; and application hosting services. Prescient Applied Intelligence Inc. was formerly known as The viaLink Company and changed its name to Prescient Applied Intelligence Inc. in January 2005. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in West Chester, Pennsylvania. As of January 13, 2009, Prescient Applied Intelligence Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Park City Group Inc.
